duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct research on molecular mechanisms underlying craniofacial development and birth defects.
Perform basic molecular biology and cell biology tasks such as PCR, gel electrophoresis, DNA/RNA extraction, and cell culture.
Learn and apply techniques using frogs as a model system for research.
Assist in the management of the laboratory including ordering supplies and maintaining the frog colony.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Biology. Lab experience and background in cell biology, biochemistry, or cell culture preferred.
